subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: The success of new players in the Stanley Cup finals, which is tied 2-2 after Chicago’s Game 4 victory, shows how the Blackhawks have built around their stars, infusing their roster with young talent.
snippet: The success of new players in the Stanley Cup finals, which is tied 2-2 after Chicago’s Game 4 victory, shows how the Blackhawks have built around their stars, infusing their roster with young talent.
